data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Cercle Brugge get the game underway.
Goal! Brugge have got their heads in front thanks to a Krepin Diatta strike.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Bruges.
Brugge have kicked-off the second half at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Anthony Musaba levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 58, Jean Harrison Marcelin (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Eduard Sobol is on a sub for Federico Ricca for Brugge.
Goal! Simon Deli gives Brugge a 2-1 lead in Bruges.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Charles De Ketelaere with Emmanuel Dennis. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
Charles Vanhoutte is replacing Franck Kanoute for Cercle Brugge at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Paul Clement is making the team's second substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Thibo Somers replacing Kylian Hazard.
In the minute 85, Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a third substitution, with Vitinho replacing Robbe Decostere.
Philippe Clement is making the team's third substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Thomas Van Den Keybus replacing Ruud Vormer.
That's full-time at Jan Breydel Stadium. The final score is 2-1.
